GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/topics: gets all the topics of the articles

GET api/users/:username: gets a specific user when given an id

GET /api/articles: gets all the articles in an array of objects- this accepts queries of sort_by and order. It can also filter by topic and author

GET /api/articles/:article_id: returns a an article object when passed an article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:id: allows to pass an object with an inc_votes key, where votes for the article_id can be ammended

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id: deletes a specific article when passed an article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments: gets all comments as an array for a particular article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments: allows to pass object of username and body to post a comment to a specific article

PATCH /api/comments/comment_id: allows to adjust the votes for a specific comment by passing in an object with a key of inc_votes and a value

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id: deletes a specific comment by it's comment_id
